otherNames: 火の鳥”道後温泉編”, Hi no Tori: Dogo Onsen-hen
synopsis: A collaborative anime between Hi no Tori and the Dougo Onsen hot spring bath house. The anime is part of a revitalization project for the Matsuyama, Ehime Prefecture bath house that began on January 15. The Dougo Onsen building is 125 years old and certain areas were due for a facelift.
